changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO csh_transaction_class (id, set_of_book_id, type_code, class_code, description, version_number, is_enabled, is_deleted, created_by, last_updated_by) VALUES (-1, -1, 'PAYMENT', 'PAYMENT', '报销', 1, 1, 0, -1, -1);

column.remarks: 历史驳回类型 RejectTypeEnum 驳回类型: 1000-正常, 1001-撤回, 1002-审批驳回 1003-审核驳回 1004-开票驳回
